text: Joaquín Castro (born September 16, 1974) is an American politician. He has served in the United States House of Representatives for Texas's 20th congressional district since 2013. Julián Castro was the 16th United States Secretary of Housing and Urban Development in the Cabinet of President Barack Obama and is a candidate for President in the 2020 election. In July 2022, Castro was diagnosed with small intestine cancer which had spread to his liver. He had surgery in February 2023 to remove the tumors. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Joaquin Castro official U.S. House website *Joaquin Castro for Congress * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from San Antonio, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from San Antonio Category:Members of the Texas Legislature
title: Joaquín Castro
